infoDescription: If you have long dreamed of making music, then it’s time to start making your desire come true.
infoList: Online music lessons: <item className={styles.listElement}>Helps to significantly save time and effort that you previously spent on the way to the place of study. </item> <item className={styles.listElement}>You save money that was previously spent on gasoline or public transport.</item> <item className={styles.listElement}>Make your own schedule of classes that is convenient for you.</item> <item className={styles.listElement}>Choose your own learning goals. </item> <item className={styles.listElement}>Classes can be conducted from anywhere in any country. </item> <item className={styles.listElement}>You can study at home, in your office, in any convenient environment.</item> <item className={styles.listElement}>Online lessons allow you to find out at any time how your child is doing in class.</item>
footerInfo1: School of harp playing by Maria Makovetskaya
footerInfo2: By contacting us for services, you consent to the processing of your personal data.

sendCode: Enter the code that was sent to your email
